attributes.action: demand the FA to remove incompetent referees or suspend them for poor performance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the most incompetent performance by a referee I have seen in a long time, Nigel Miller (Durham), I ask for the goverment and its ministers to enforce the FA to remove or suspend referees like this.

For one if they are incompetent at there job they can potentially entice a crowd of 1000's of supporters to become agited, which causes issues both in the ground and out of the ground.

They should be there to control the game not to cause issues and to also ensure they carry through withthere post game duties.

I mean 7 injury time minutes at the Albion....

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
